resources.string: "SCHOOL SECURED" IS A SURVEILLANCE ARCHITECTURE THAT HELPS IN TRACKING STUDENT\'S LOCATIONS USING AN HANDHELD IOT DEVICE. THE IOT DEVICE IS EQUIPPED WITH GSM/GPS CAPABILITIES SO THAT IT CAN BROADCAST ITS COORDINATES. PARENTS ARE PROVIDED WITH A MOBILE APPLICATION AND A WEB APPLICATION WHERE THEY CAN MONITOR THEIR CHILDREN\'S LOCATIONS DURING SCHOOL TIME AND GET REAL-TIME NOTIFICATION IF THEY LEAVE THE PREMISES. IN CASE ANY OF THE STUDENTS LEAVE THE SCHOOL PREMISES DURING SCHOOL TIME, THE MOBILE APPLICATION PROMPTS THE PARENTS TO EITHER CALL LOCAL AUTHORITIES, OR CALL THE MODULE ITSELF SINCE IT IS EQUIPPED WITH CALLING CAPABILITES.
